solution_line_template: If she had {total_papers} papers, the total number of documents she separated as invalid is {invalid_percentage} * {total_papers} pages = <<{invalid_percentage}*{total_papers}={invalid_papers}>>{invalid_papers} pages.
The number of valid documents is {total_papers} pages - {invalid_papers} pages = <<{total_papers}-{invalid_papers}={valid_documents}>>{valid_documents} pages
